titles.title: Labor Relations First Contract Negotiations Act of 2005
To amend the National Labor Relations Act to require the arbitration of initial contract negotiation disputes, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health, Employment, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: House Committee on Education and Labor

bill.summary: 1/4/2007--Introduced. Labor Relations First Contract Negotiations Act of 2005 [sic]- Amends the National Labor Relations Act to require mediation and, if necessary, binding arbitration of initial contract negotiation disputes.
